title: Add CarTrade Tech, target price Rs 675: Kotak Institutional Equities - Economic Times
content: Add CarTrade Tech, target price Rs 675: Kotak Institutional Equities  Economic Times
description: The brokerage said it notes that the company has Rs 10 billion of cash on books as of March 2022 which it plans to utilize for inorganic growth. Absure (dealer assisted car buy and sell model) will take time to scale-up given lack of high quality used car dealers.
